MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the EH47 Postcode area of Bathgate. It will necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 10.15PM to replace faulty electrical equipment on Bickerton Terrace and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.30AM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.52PM on 24th March 2021.
